With My World Clock Tab, you can view your several famous timezones from around the world in the new tab search & search the web in one convenient place. 
The My World Clock Tab offers convenient web search and features from the Chrome New Tab.

By Clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing (product name) extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the services in terms of use https://www.myworldclocktab.com/tos and privacy policy https://www.myworldclocktab.com/privacy

About us & Contact us - https://www.myworldclocktab.com/about
 
How to remove our extension from Chrome browser:
 
1) Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings".
3) In the menu that appears click on "Extensions".
4) From the list of installed Extensions, find the name of the extension you wish to uninstall.
5) Click on the trash can icon to the right of "Enable" (for the extension you wish to uninstall).
6) Our extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
